name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF SHAREHOLDERS AND CONSUMER ATTORNEYS
sampleDescriptions: Implementation and application of provisions of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act. Vacancies at the SEC. General consumer and investor rights issues.
